oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Baptist Memorial Hospital Physicians' and Surgeons' Building
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Baptist Memorial Hospital and Physicians’ and Surgeons’ Building, Memphis, Tenn.” Color image of exterior with trolleys and vehicles in front of building.

“Baptist Memorial Hospital -- The South’s Greatest Hospital, The Most Complete Service of any Hospital in the United States. Four Hundred Beds, Splendid Hotel, Doctors’ Office Building, Grill, Drug Store, Barber Shop, Beauty Shop, Flower Shop – All Under One Roof and a Garage Adjoining. 1929 Record – 15,094 Patients Admitted -- Charity $228,413.16. No Endowment, Community Chest or Taxation Support.”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Baptist Memorial Hospital; hospitals; medicine; Walnut Grove; Baptist East;
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: C. T. American Art Colored; Collection processed by Angela Price
